name: Kung Fu
description: Kung Fu is a kind of martial art, but it is also means - Skill achieved through hard work - in traditional Chinese. It is characterized by hard striking and flexible body handling, it is good at knocking your opponent off their feet.
initiate: You stand and become vigilant against attacks *

static_buffs.name: Kung fu breath
static_buffs.description: You can always keep calm by a unique breathing method. Bonus for avoidance and blow

onmove_buffs.name: Kung fu move
onmove_buffs.description: Using footwork you can always turn to attack and avoid. Bonus to hit and avoid

ondodge_buffs.name: Kung fu dodge
ondodge_buffs.description: The moment of avoiding the attack is not necessarily a chance. Always hear the gap of counterattack. Bonus for avoidance and blow. Duplicate possible

name: Niten Ichi-Ryu
description: Niten Ichi-Ryu is an ancient school of combat, transmitting a style of classical Japanese swordsmanship conceived by the warrior Miyamoto Musashi.
initiate: You clear your mind as you prepare yourself for combat.

onmove_buffs.name: Blocking
onmove_buffs.description: You forgo dodging on the move, but gain more blocks.

onhit_buffs.name: Blocking
onhit_buffs.description: You forgo dodging on the offensive, but gain more blocks.

ondodge_buffs.name: In-One Timing Set-Up
ondodge_buffs.description: You found a gap in the enemy's defense!
